intro.title: I'm Marin.
intro.content: I'm a full-stack developer specializing in DevOps, with a background in International Relations. I deliver any type of application with clean code, solid architecture, and a smooth user experience.
intro.current: Currently, I'm working as a DevOps Engineer at Finovox.

approach.title: From idea to execution
approach.content: I code by thinking first, building second. I move across frontend, backend, and DevOps to keep the system coherent. Clean code, clear structure, and things that don't need fixing twice.
